title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a report parameter that is set as a list box, the default value gets lost.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Add three values: 'aa', 'bb', and 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa' directly and click OK.
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
7. Observe the value in the list box.
